questions: Is there a pen in the image?
Is there a blanket in the image?
Is the blanket made of fabric?
Is the pen on the right of the blanket?
model_output:
Yes, there is a pen in the image; it is clearly visible on top of the surface.
Yes, there is a blanket in the image; it is crumpled underneath the pen.
Yes, the pen is metallic; it has a shiny, reflective metallic surface.
Yes, the blanket is made of fabric; its texture and appearance suggest a soft, woven fabric.
Yes, the pen is on the right of the blanket; as seen, it is positioned mainly to the blanket's right side.
